Container.Name: InfraDB
Container.Overview: InfraDB - A professional cable labeling system for Brady printers with automatic reference numbering, comprehensive user management, and role-based permissions. Features modern React frontend with Express backend optimized for MySQL.
Container.Description: InfraDB - A professional cable labeling system for Brady printers with automatic reference numbering, comprehensive user management, and role-based permissions. Features modern React frontend with Express backend optimized for MySQL.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port to access InfraDB on your host (container always uses 3000 internally)

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Optional directory for app marker files (setup completion)

Config.Name: Uploads Directory
Config.Description: Optional directory for uploaded/generated files (if used)

Config.Name: JWT Secret
Config.Description: Secret key for JWT tokens (leave empty to auto-generate on first start, but recommended to set a persistent value for production)
